content: Just landed in NYC. Excited to share my Japan insights at the next tech event. Here's to blending cultures and tech!
raw_content: Just touched down in NYC after an unforgettable journey in Japan. Feeling a mix of excitement to reconnect with my community and a bit of uncertainty about blending the insights I've gained into my tech event plans. Here we go!

content: Turned 22 and dove into AI-driven dev tools. Now, blending this with blockchain for my next project.
raw_content: **Just turned 22 and celebrated with a deep dive into AI-driven dev tools. Excited to blend this knowledge with blockchain for my next project!**
